titleInfo.title: Two men and a boy pose in front of a Hermitage Taxi Service airplane at Hampton Field, 1920 March 21

location.physicalLocation: Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219

mods.abstract: Photograph of two white men and a black boy standing in front of a Curtiss JN “Jenny” aircraft. Each man is wearing an aviator or “bomber” hat with goggles and the boy is dressed in overalls and a button-up shirt. One man has his arms around the boy and the child is gripping the man’s hands. The photograph was taken on March 21, 1920 at Hampton Field. The airplane is branded with a white Curtiss logo on a dark field. The airplane was used by the Hermitage Taxi Service to provide private flights to other cities in addition to their usual local vehicle taxi service in Nashville. Forms part of the Nashville Room Historic Photographs Collection. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.
